title: Very Scarce Old Judges for Sale or Trade
author: oldjudge

posts.post_title: Very Scarce Old Judges for Sale or Trade
posts.post_content:
Old Judges seem hot again and I have some very scarce Old Judges for sale or trade. Please email me at [url]oldjudge@gmail.com[/url] if interested.

Thanks--Jay

1. Umpire Fessenden-Great image. Small chip in left border accounts for the grade.-----$875
2. Rare Anonymous Old Judge--Goodwin and Co left all identification of Con Daley off the card creating this rarity--$1500
3. Hanrahan (Chicago Maroons)--Rare card from this one year Western Assn. team--$750
4. Conway (Worcester)--very scarce team variation of Dick Conway. This is the only pose of his known with Worcester. Great image, with the "Worcester" name clear on his chest--$1500
5. O'Brien Mini-Minis are incredibly rare. For a complete explanation of their origin please refer to the Old Judge book.-----$1750
6. Henderson Mini--$1500
